cause.description:
Thousands of whales are being forgotten about because of cute little seals and monkeys! We are here to help Save The Whales, that have suffered from oil spills, pollution and other types of neglect!
1. Whales must be remembered!
2. The saving must start immediately!
3. Whales are lovely creatures, lets not forget about them!
cause.mission: Help as many whales as possible!
cause.name: SAVE THE WHALES!!!!!!!!!!
